channel.title: How do i make people join my server?
channel.description: Well i am pretty new here at moparscape and i want to know how to make people join my server or how to join others. So please help me i need answer :)

item.title: How do i make people join my server?
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

First off go to the rs2 server advertisment board witch is located at the main page of moparscape fourms.REMEMBER FOLLOW THE LAYOUT.

[code]Code:
Server Name: Name of Your Server here

Server IP: IP of Your Server here

Server Port: Port of Your Server here

Optional:

Code:
Hamachi: Yes/No (If its yes add the Pass/Name)

Online Status: Status of Your Server here (You can delete this if you want)

Server Features: Features of Your Server here

Server Staff: Staff of Your Server here[/code]

or you could just find some one else’s server by finding the server ip and port and try to login.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people join my server?

item.title: How do i make people join my server?
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

you cant “make” people join your server they have to do that out of their own free will, now what you can do is setup advertisement for your server include your features and then people might join
